lore: Although Basilisks are much larger than humans, they have learned not to pick a fight with them. Still, showing fear in front of these creatures often means becoming their prey.\n\nAccording to a legend, the Spitting Basilisk is a rare specimen that, in addition to emitting a powerful scream, releases a substance that causes death on contact with the skin. This, like many other legends, is false. Its saliva, in fact, has powerful healing and analgesic properties.
menagerieDialog: (It's crouched down, staring blankly into nothingness.)
(It's busy eating a fish. Any time someone comes too close to it, it growls protectively.)
(It's sniffing in deep gulps of air, perhaps in search of food.)
(It burps up a boot. You don't even want to know who it once belonged to.)
(It bows its head and turns away. It must be shy.)
name: Spitting Basilisk
